item.title: Fixed bug 7107: Only print warnings, don't exit when erasing ...
item.description:
Rev 44623 - tolsen (2 file(s) modified)
Fixed bug 7107: Only print warnings, don't exit when erasing or
programming flash sectors fail.
* Avr32Program::program(): Use auto_ptr and new class for deleting a
vector of pointers, removing try/catch block, thus flattening the
method.
item.author: tolsen

item.title: Fixed bug 7107: When LOCKE flag is set during programming ...
item.description:
Rev 44622 - tolsen (8 file(s) modified)
Fixed bug 7107: When LOCKE flag is set during programming or erasing, print
warning and resume/retry.
* INTERFACE BREAK: Added flag to Flash::programChip() to ignore
LockErrors (implemented in InternalFlash only), used on retry.
* InternalFlash::decodeFlashStatus(): new method for easier debugging.
* Added LockError exception class for this purpose.
item.author: tolsen

item.title: Added missing mask/offset defines for FSR fields.
item.description:
Rev 44621 - tolsen (1 file(s) modified)
Added missing mask/offset defines for FSR fields.
item.author: tolsen

item.title: Fixed bug #8346: If eraseEntireChip() catches an exception, rethrow it for ...
item.description:
Rev 44613 - tolsen (1 file(s) modified)
Fixed bug #8346: If eraseEntireChip() catches an exception, rethrow it
for proper handling.
item.author: tolsen
